content: **knitted jumper in drops sky the piece is worked top down with high neck raglan cables and split in sides sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-184 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **yarn** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 350-400-450-450-500-550 g colour 06 sea green **needles** drops circular needles size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needles size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
